short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this extension will block users who always spam pantip.com. And will auto block comment with more than 3 images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will auto remove jjny comment when scroll down www.pantip.com. Also working on m.pantip.com.
